name: (BM) 1. Speaking: IT Technician & User Interaction
questionContents: What issue are you experiencing with your device?
Can you describe the problem in detail?
When did the issue first occur?
What troubleshooting steps have you already tried?
Are there any error messages appearing on the screen?

name: (BM) 2. Writing: Composing a Technical Report
questionContents:
Write a technical report about a recent IT system issue. Include the following points:
- Description of the problem
- Steps taken to diagnose the issue
- Solutions attempted
- Final resolution
- Recommendations for future prevention
